summary: MY NISSAN JUKE 2014 AWD VAPOR LOCKED IN HOT WEATHER.  THE DEALER WAS AWARE OF THE PROBLEM AND TOLD ME TO USE 91 OR HIGHER OCTANE GAS AND NOT TO FILL THE TANK WHEN REFUELING.  THEY ALSO REPROGRAMMED THE CAR.  THOUGH THE DEALER TOOK GREAT CARE OF ME THE EXPLANATION SEEMED STRANGE.  THE CAR WAS SIMPLY TURNING OFF WHEN IDLING.  IT HASN'T HAPPENED SINCE, BUT I AM NOW MORE FEARFUL DRIVING IT.
